thread.title: BRIEF-Platinum Group Metals Announces $3.19 Million Strategic Investment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Platinum Group Metals Announces $3.19 Million Strategic Investment
text:
May 3, 2018 / 7:55 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Platinum Group Metals Announces $3.19 Million Strategic Investment Reuters Staff
May 3 (Reuters) - Platinum Group Metals Ltd:
* PLATINUM GROUP METALS LTD. ANNOUNCES US$3.19 MILLION STRATEGIC INVESTMENT
* PLATINUM GROUP METALS LTD - HCI ENTERED INTO SUBSCRIPTION DEAL ON PRIVATE PLACEMENT BASIS, FOR PURCHASE OF 16.8 MILLION UNITS AT A PRICE OF $0.19
* PLATINUM GROUP METALS LTD - INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF PRIVATE PLACEMENT FOR REPAYMENT OF DEBT DUE TO LIBERTY METALS & MINING HOLDINGS
* PLATINUM GROUP METALS LTD - HOSKEN CONSOLIDATED INVESTMENTS LIMITED AGREED TO MAKE INVESTMENT WHICH WILL RESULT IN HCI OWNING 10.0% OF COâ€™S SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
